pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Mighty Morphin Alien Rangers (1996, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft the Red Ranger's $(l:alien/devices/power_morphers#red_alien_morpher)Alien Morpher$(/l) & $(l:alien/arsenal/aquitian_saber)Aquitian Saber$(/l)$(br2)Used to access the Red Ranger's $(l:alien/rangers/alien_red)Base$(/l) forms
